mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(id, name, email, password, birth_date) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{birthDate})
mapper.select: SELECT user_seq as userSeq, id, name, email, birth_date as birthDate, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
